tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: i visited Dr. Shalu for my new born baby and since then i am consulting her as i have got some kind of faith in her, my new born had some skin allergies which is cured after taking prescribed medication. she has a very soothing personality, which gave me an assurance whenever i was worried. thanks Dr. Shalu.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Femiint is our default choice for any health needs. Everything is organised well here. Starting from front office to nurses everyone is very helpful. Cleanliness is too notch. We've consulted Dr Shalu Jain today for my 4year old Son's cough and cold issues. We didn't have to wait for long and the doctor was very friendly, gave us the right explanation about the problem and helped with the right medicines and diagnosis without any anitibiotics. Thanks once again Doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Shalu Jain is a very sensitive doctor. Whatever queries patients have, she listened to all of them with utmost concern, Care and patience and then answer/explain very nicely. She has a very natural ability/skill to make the patient feel comfortable and free of all doubts, anxiety.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Good ********* *** explanation and not much waiting ,friendly and kind,clean and hygiene maintain,impressed

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Not recommended. Had a very bad experience with her. I went to her with my 12 month old baby having fever to Femiint Health and Fertility Hospital, Whitefield. Very first day she prescribed 4 medicines and few blood and urine tests. Next day baby's fever went to 103.9F *** ** ******* ******** ******** ********* ** ***** We ran to her with him and it was 12.50 PM and she refused to attend. When we told her that he is just 1yr and his fever is this high, she replied like her duty time is up to 1PM and if she attend this then she will be late in the next hospital. Also advised us to wait till 2.30PM for the next doctor to come. Non of the doctor should show this kind of behaviour at least a pediatrician. I would never suggest this doctor.

tags: None
review: Very friendly and explained the problem in detail. Took time to hear the complaints properly and checked all vitals.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Met with her when she was in femint hospital..
Every time i took my daughter for some or some critical issue.. she handled with care and treated immediately.

Unfortunately I got relocated to Hyderabad and no one can match her..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: She is a great doctor, explains wells the issue . Very welcoming and a good listener. I have been consulting her ever since my baby was 4months. She is always available for any emergencies via call or WhatsApp aswell.

reply_text: Thanks for such kind words in appreciation

review: I visited Dr Jain for my baby's vaccination. Her nature is very friendly and she guides well. Hence this clinic is too far still we visit her only because of her pleasant nature.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Such a great Doctor, understand the child philosophy and treat them in very friendly  manner. Thanks  a lot Doctor  Shalu.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: She listens patiently about baby problems,if anything not serious or avoidable she tells directly, does not make it complicated. Unnecessary not going for any treatment. And best part is the way she puts injection,  my baby does not cry much.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pediatric Vaccinations, Consultation provided for all pediatric disease,
review: Dr. Shalu Jain is very good at her job and is patient with the parents and kids alike. She listened keenly to what we had to say and gave valuable suggestions. Vaccinations for our baby are a breeze with her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review: Thank you so much Doctor, for everything, it was a nice experience. The proximity and the specialist available makes Femint a great place for treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I get my newborn checkups done by Dr.Shalu. Also got him vaccinated by her. She is caring and gives enough time to check babies.Doesn't recommend much medicines rather insists to use home remedies.Please have video consultation too😊,at times that is also needed.
reply_text: Thanks for your kind words of appreciation

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Doctor is friendly enough with kids.I recommend her very much. Suggestions: Practo app does not show correct timings and we need to wait more than an hour as doctor yet to reach the centre. please take necessary actionsWe could not able to connect with Femint clinic irrespective of calling different timings after 8 am. Always unattended.Kindly support customers
